thread.title: MARILYN J FARLAND
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by MARILYN J FARLAND

author: MARILYN J FARLAND
title: MARILYN J FARLAND
text: I ordered 3 pair of glasses in a 5.00 strength. All 3 of them arrived scratched so badly that I had to send them back. Now I'm irritated that I had to pay postage to return them. As of yet I don't know if they will reimburse me for that postage. Either way, the fact that all of the glasses arrived scratched is very very bad!!
